author: RegdarKhrast

text: Oh before I forget, concerning tracks 5 to 8. After a fun and memorable "Voyage" on the road, you're still driving at "3am", starting to feel very tired and seeing strange illusions. You finally find a spot to lay down, find yourself in a state of "Mid Sleep", fall asleep after a while and go "Adrift" in your dreams. :P
author: SupraDarky

text: I'll be sure to check it out, SD! :D
author: Jirt

text: This is REAL!  Suh-WEEET! (Sweet!)
author: David Harris

text: You'll notice some of my older tracks are missing, that's because I felt like they sounded too different (I was using the basic FL Studio kits). I'll probably release a small album just for those later. Anyways, I'm leaving wednesday so see you guys in 3 weeks!
author: SupraDarky

text: I've gotten many requests over the years to release an album with the tracks I made in the best quality possible. No new tracks here (they've all been uploaded on this channel previously as you can see in the description). Bandcamp is perfect since it allows me to release it professionally while still keeping the free download option. So yeah, available in MP3 320kbps, FLAC, etc.
author: SupraDarky
